body.p: The Divvun project is a project under the Norwegian Sámi Parliament to make proofing tools for Sámi, which means spell checkers and automatic hyphenators for North, Lule and South Sámi. The proofing tools work on Linux (soon), MacOS X and on Windows in the most common office applications. Proofing tools for North and Lule Sámi are available, tools for South Sámi is being made in the so-called Divvun II project.

section.title: Finished products
section.p: Finished proofing tools are available free of charge by clicking the links below. The downloads are traditional installers that install the proofing tools easily on the users' computers. The proofing tools work the same way as proofing tools for other languages.

section.title: Without Internet?
section.p: For users with slow or no access to Internet, it is possible to order a CD from the Norwegian Sámi Parliament by calling: +47-78 48 42 22.

section.title: Anonymous cvs
section.p: The source code for this project belonging to the Norwegian Sámi Parliament and/or the University of Tromsø is open source, and is available through anonymous cvs. We have also written a document on how to find your way through the source code.

section.title: Download documentation
section.p: All the documentation on this project is available on this site. If you would like to have this documentation on your own computer, follow the instruction on anonymous cvs, then go on to setup forrest. After that all our documentation sits on your own computer, and you can navigate through it with a web browser.
